title: Haveron of the Twin legion
name: haveron
description: A knight from the "Twin legion[1]". A (man?) covered in full armor, seen carrying his crippled sister aalina[2]. From what has been seen, he is also a fellow adventurer

origin: Haveron said him and her are from the twin legion to the band of TEMP
charRelationships: -Feels obliged to pay back the band of TEMP for cooperating in escaping from the embalming lake
